results.name: a(n) = 2*n+3+3*(-1)^n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
program: (MAGMA) I:=[2,10,6]; [n le 3 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-2)-Self(n-3): n in [1..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 03 2013
(Python) for n in range(1,50): print(2*n+3+3*(-1)**n, end=', ') # _Stefano Spezia_, Nov 01 2018
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 29 2008
